Sentencas: The composite anode and cathode of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) are modelled as sintered mixtures of electrolyte and electrocatalyst particles.
Titulo: Discrete modelling of the electrochemical performance of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: A particle packing is first created numerically by the discrete element method (DEM) from a loose packing of 40000 spherical, monosized, homogeneously mixed, and randomly positioned particles.
Titulo: Discrete modelling of the electrochemical performance of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: Once the microstructure is sintered numerically, the effective electrode conductivity is determined by discretization of the particle packing into a resistance network.
Titulo: Discrete modelling of the electrochemical performance of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: Each particle contact is characteristic of a bond resistance that depends on contact geometry and particle properties.
Titulo: Discrete modelling of the electrochemical performance of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: The network, which typically consists of 120 000 bond resistances in total, is solved using Kirchhoff's current law.
Titulo: Discrete modelling of the electrochemical performance of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: Distributions of local current densities and particle potentials are then performed.
Titulo: Discrete modelling of the electrochemical performance of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: We investigate how electrode performance depends on parameters such as electrode composition, thickness, density and intrinsic material conductivities that are temperature dependent.
Titulo: Discrete modelling of the electrochemical performance of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: The simulations show that the best electrode performance is obtained for compositions close to the percolation threshold of the electronic conductor.
Titulo: Discrete modelling of the electrochemical performance of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: Depending on particle conductivities, the electrode performance is a function of its thickness.
Titulo: Discrete modelling of the electrochemical performance of SOFC electrodes

Sentencas: Additionally, DEM simulations generate useful microstructural information such as: coordination numbers, triple phase boundary length and percolation thresholds.
Titulo: Discrete modelling of the electrochemical performance of SOFC electrodes
